banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: A millennial's proposal for a happy multigenerational workplace
videoData.socialTitle: A millennial's proposal for a happy multigenerational workplace

nodes.whoTheyAre: Patrice Thompson is a permanent member of the Request for Proposal EMEA team, whose aim is to create effective marketing documents that promote products and services for institutional clients. As a graduate from the London School of Economics with a B.Sc. in Government and Economics, Thompson completed three rotations in the Professional Development Program in Foreign Exchange Sales and Trading, Transition Management, and the Regulatory Reform Project Management Office.

videoData.description: The unique challenges of integrating millennials into the workplace have been well explored. But what about the other side of the coin? Gen Y'er Patrice Thompson explores the issue from the Gen Y perspective. She charts the differences between Gen X and Gen Y, and maps out a few ways that organizations can create environments where workers of all ages can collaborate and succeed.
